name: Lightning-Riding Treasure Hunter (II)
achievementgroup: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series II

stage1.description: Open 40 chests on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

stage2.description: Open 80 chests on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.

stage3.description: Open 160 chests on Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island in Inazuma.
